definition: earth/dust/clay/local/indigenous/crude opium/unsophisticated/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]

sentences.english: Application of Fractal Geometry in Pedology and its Prosptects.
sentences.chinese: 分形幾何在土壤學中的應用及其展望。

sentences.english: The need for students majoring in crop and soil sciences is growing.
sentences.chinese: 對主修作物和土壤學的學生的需求量正在逐漸增加。

sentences.english: Another aspect to Crop and Soil Sciences is turf grass management.
sentences.chinese: 作物與土壤學的另一方面是草坪的管理。

sentences.english: Soil organic matter(SOM) is always a research focus in the soil and environmental science.
sentences.chinese: 土壤腐殖物質一直是土壤學和環境學領域的研究熱點。

sentences.english: Courses are likely to include soil science, turf management, and pest control.
sentences.chinese: 課程可能包括土壤學，草坪管理，病蟲害防治。

sentences.english: There is a close relationship between crop science and soil science.
sentences.chinese: 作物學和土壤學關係密切。
我們爲什麼要學習土壤學？

sentences.english: As a important subject of pedology, soil micromorphology was setup in 1930s and solved many questions of pedology.
sentences.chinese: 土壤微形態學是土壤學的一個重要分支學科。
